full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFQ) for Level 1 and Level 3 Training Facilitators

| **Item** | **Description**                                                     |
| :------ | :----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Reference Number** | PW-23-01023073                                                |
| **Tender Number**    | 100022492                                                      |
| **Publication Date** | January 25, 2023                                                |
| **Tender Closing Date** | February 21, 2023 at 14:00:00                                     |
| **Amendment Date**   | February 17, 2023                                                |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | September 1, 2023                                               |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | November 10, 2023                                               |
| **Tender Status**    | Expired (Closed)                                                  |
| **Trade Agreements** | World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)    |

## Tender Description

**Employment and Social Development Canada** is inviting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide **Level 1 and Level 3 Training Facilitators** for the delivery of virtual training courses, specifically **Building Resilience – Thriving in a Call Centre Environment**, for ESDC call centre employees.

**Scope of Work:** The suppliers will be responsible for delivering a total of **140 training sessions**.

**Estimated Contract Duration:** **September 1, 2023 – November 10, 2023**

## Important Details

* This tender is closed, and all responses were due on **February 21, 2023** at 14:00:00.
* The contract is expected to commence on **September 1, 2023**, and close on **November 10, 2023**.
* Suppliers must be able to provide evidence of required certifications or experience.
* All proposals must be submitted in writing to **Esseultember@essbc.ca**.

Note: This tender is specific to **Employment and Social Development Canada** and is open to suppliers who are able to provide the necessary services. Suppliers must ensure that they have the necessary certifications or experience required for this tender. The contract duration, tender closing date, and other important details have been included above. Suppliers who are interested in this tender should review the tender description and scope of work carefully before submitting their proposals.
